text:
e="preserve">Gordon Arthur Cyril Stewart OJ, CD (6 July 1941 – 4 January 2021), commonly known as Butch Stewart, was a Jamaican hotelier and businessman. He was the founder, owner and chairman of Sandals Resorts, Beaches Resorts. He also owned "The Jamaica Observer". He was born in Kingston, Jamaica.
Stewart died in Miami, Florida on 4 January 2021 at the age of 79.
